data.name: Sora Aoi is Tsumugi
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Japanese adult bombshell Sora Aoi (Sola Aoi) plays Tsumugi, a typical Japanese teenager—who just happens to be in love with her teacher, Katagiri. Tsumugi seduces Katagiri and he falls for her. But at the same time, Tsumugi is also attracted to her classmate, Kosuke, and soon she’s trapped in a sexy love triangle. Tsumugi faces a dilemma: Who will she stay with?
data.about_the_game: Japanese adult bombshell Sora Aoi (Sola Aoi) plays Tsumugi, a typical Japanese teenager—who just happens to be in love with her teacher, Katagiri. Tsumugi seduces Katagiri and he falls for her. But at the same time, Tsumugi is also attracted to her classmate, Kosuke, and soon she’s trapped in a sexy love triangle. Tsumugi faces a dilemma: Who will she stay with?
data.short_description: Japanese AV superstar, Sora Aoi (Sola Aoi) plays an innocent high school girl Tsumugi!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: Contains mature language, simulated adult situations and graphic nudity. This film is for discerning adults of legal age only. Not suitable for minors. Viewer discretion is advised. Please check your country's local laws before purchasing or renting this film.
